column5: Sample Question
column6: Example Prospect Answer

column5: "What’s making you consider this now?"
column6: "No real reason, I just figured I’d explore it."

column5: "Is there something that made you think more seriously?"
column6: "I went through a breakup last month and realized I need to look at my patterns."

column5: "Is now the right time for you to tackle this?"
column6: "I’ve put this off for too long. I can’t keep doing this to myself."

column5: "Is this project tied to any timeline?"
column6: "No, it’s more of a long-term idea."

column5: "Is there a reason you're looking at this now?"
column6: "We’ve started Q2 planning and want to explore options."

column5: "Is there a deadline driving this initiative?"
column6: "We must have a system before the fiscal year starts next month."

column5: "Why are you looking to sell now?"
column6: "Just curious what we could get. No pressure."

column5: "Any ideal timing you’re hoping for?"
column6: "Preferably by summer so we can travel more easily."

column5: "What’s driving the need to sell now?"
column6: "We need to sell within 30 days or we lose our next home."

column5: "What if you wait another year?"
column6: "Nothing terrible would happen. I’m used to it."

column5: "Is there a downside to not acting now?"
column6: "More of the same — lonely weekends, second-guessing myself."

column5: "What would it cost emotionally to stay in this place?"
column6: "It’s devastating. I feel like I’m missing out on building a future."

column5: "What’s the downside if this doesn’t get done soon?"
column6: "Not much. It’s just inefficient."

column5: "Impact of continuing as-is for a few more months?"
column6: "Burning 10–15 hours/week in admin and cleanup."

column5: "What’s the cost of delaying this fix?"
column6: "We’re losing $30K/month in churn — it’s bleeding revenue."

column5: "What happens if the house doesn’t sell soon?"
column6: "Not a big deal. We’re flexible."

column5: "Is there a consequence to waiting?"
column6: "Longer we hold it, more we pay in taxes and maintenance."

column5: "Why can’t this wait?"
column6: "We’ll lose our deposit and financing if we don’t sell in 45 days."

column5: "Do you have capacity to focus on this now?"
column6: "No. Work is crazy and I’m barely keeping up."

column5: "What else do you have going on right now?"
column6: "Got a lot, but I think I could make room."

column5: "Do you have the bandwidth to work on this?"
column6: "Yes. I’ve cleared time and this is my #1 priority."

column5: "Does your team have space to take this on now?"
column6: "No — we’re mid-implementation on something else."

column5: "Will this conflict with ongoing projects?"
column6: "It might, but we can stagger rollout."

column5: "Can your team implement this right now?"
column6: "Absolutely. It’s our next key project and we’ve freed up resources."

column5: "Ready to move forward if a good offer comes in?"
column6: "We’re traveling for 6 weeks, so not really."

column5: "Is your timeline flexible?"
column6: "We prefer now, but have logistics to work through."

column5: "Can you engage quickly if we bring a buyer?"
column6: "Yes. Everything is packed and we’re ready to sign."
